hero.title: Me, as a <highlight>person</highlight> and as a <highlight>professional</highlight>
hero.subtitle: This page gives a bit of context about who I am, where I come from, and what matters to me, both in and outside of work.
hero.locationInfo: I currently live in a quiet town near Barcelona, where I was born and where I find the calm I need to think and create. I'm open to moving elsewhere if the project and timing feel right.
hero.whatIDoInfo: Software engineer with a technical and creative focus, comfortable designing the system as well as building it.

techStack.title: Technologies and tools
techStack.description: A quick look at the technologies I'm comfortable working with.
techStack.note: Tools like <highlight>TensorFlow</highlight> and <highlight>Scikit-Learn</highlight> are ones I've mostly used in learning-driven projects: an image classifier built with convolutional networks, small supervised and unsupervised machine-learning experiments, and a few optimization projects. I wouldn't call myself an expert, but I do have a solid hands-on foundation and keep digging deeper.

trajectory.title: Academic path and experience
trajectory.description: So far my journey includes a game design and development degree, an initial applied research internship, and lots of self-directed learning. I prefer to focus on a handful of things at a time but go deep, so each stage truly reshapes how I think and how I work.

ProjectsPage.cta_text: If any of my projects caught your interest, I'd be happy to chat. Get in touch if you'd like to collaborate, need more details, or simply want to say hello.
